content.speaker: Mr. McCONNELL
content.text:
Mr. McCONNELL. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate 
proceed to the consideration of S. Res. 493, submitted earlier today.

content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER
content.text: The PRESIDING OFFICER. The clerk will report the resolution by title.

content.speaker: The RECORDER
content.text:
The legislative clerk read as follows:

       A resolution (S. Res. 493) to authorize testimony, 
     documents, and representation in United States v. 
     Stahlnecker.

content.speaker: The RECORDER
content.text:
There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the 
resolution.

content.speaker: Mr. McCONNELL
content.text:
Mr. McCONNELL. I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed 
to, the preamble be agreed to, and the motions to reconsider be 
considered made and laid upon the table with no intervening action or 
debate.

content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER
content.text: The PRESIDING OFFICER. Without objection, it is so ordered.

content.speaker: The RECORDER
content.text:
The preamble was agreed to.
  (The resolution, with its preamble, is printed in today's Record 
under ``Submitted Resolutions.'')

doc_title: AUTHORIZING TESTIMONY, DOCUMENTS, AND REPRESENTATION IN UNITED STATES V. STAHLNECKER
title: AUTHORIZING TESTIMONY, DOCUMENTS, AND REPRESENTATION IN UNITED STATES  V. STAHLNECKER
